text: Mario Margarito "Maryo" Jorolan de los Reyes (December 12, 1952 â€“ January 27, 2018) was a Filipino movie and television director. He was born in Santa Cruz, Manila. His 2003 movie Magnifico was entered into the 54th Berlin International Film Festival. Reyes suffered a heart attack and died on 27 January 2018 in Dipolog, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines, at the age of 65.Director Maryo J Delos Reyes dies == References == == Other websites == * Category:1952 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Filipino movie directors Category:Television directors Category:People from Manila
title: Maryo J. de los Reyes
